getStatistics

public java.util.SortedMap getStatistics(java.lang.String simulationName)
Gets statistics for a given client connection or returns null if the name was not found

Parameters:
simulationName - Simulation name for this connection
Returns:
SortedMap containing most recently reported statistics

getAllStatistics

public java.util.SortedMap getAllStatistics()

Gets all statistics for all clients connected

The format is simulationName/statistic, and so the simulation name can be parsed out from the statistic by looking for the first / character.

Returns:
SortedMap containing all statistics

setLogDirectory

public void setLogDirectory(java.io.File logDirectory)
Sets the log directory where the results of each simulation will be logged

Parameters:
logDirectory - Log directory (or set to null to turn off logging)

getLogDirectory

public java.io.File getLogDirectory()
Gets the current log directory

Returns:
Current log directory (or null for none)
